body:
This PR includes the following changes to the `sqlite` package:

- [x] Add new versions 3.37.0 and 3.37.1
- [x] Change `+rtree` to default to True (same as Autotools default)
- [x] Add new `+dynamic_extensions` variant
- [ ] Auto-detect `+dynamic_extensions` variant

I'm having a bit of trouble with the last one. We can't test `load_extension` without an extension to load. We could build and load a custom minimal extension but I don't know SQL well enough to write one. I think there are examples in the docs.

Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Apple Clang 12.0.0.

Closes #28186
title: SQLite: add new version/variant
